txt.en: 'So you want to be an \qAlly\q of the Riders of Stangard? Allow me to help!\n\n'Speak to me again when you are ready.'
'Alright, soon you will be an Ally of the Riders of Stangard. Ready?'
Great River - Riders of Stangard III
Talk to the friendly rep Man to continue
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Ally of the Riders of Stangard.
